# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and excellence. Considering its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive product to you at a special introductory price of $200. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
